registration.title: User registration
registration.description_enabled: Enable this feature to restrict new registrations, allowing only pre-approved users.
registration.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow the system to freely accept new user registrations without restrictions.

sn.title: Sms notification
sn.description_enabled: Enable this feature to send SMS notifications for system updates and alerts.
sn.description_disabled: Disable this feature to completely prevent any sms notifications from being sent by the system.

en.title: Email notification
en.description_enabled: Enable this feature to send email notifications for important events and updates.
en.description_disabled: Disable this feature to completely prevent any email notifications from being sent by the system.

pn.title: Push notification
pn.description_enabled: Enable this feature to send push notifications for important updates and alerts.
pn.description_disabled: Disable this feature to completely prevent any push notifications from being sent by the system.

force_ssl.title: Force SSL
force_ssl.description_enabled: Enable this feature to secure all user communications with encryption for privacy.
force_ssl.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the platform without requiring secure connections.

agree.title: Agree policy
agree.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to actively agree to the platform policies during the sign-up process.
agree.description_disabled: Disable this feature to skip policy agreement during the registration process.

secure_password.title: Force secure password
secure_password.description_enabled: Enable this feature to enforce strong passwords during registration and updates.
secure_password.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to create and set weak passwords for their accounts.

in_app_payment.title: In app payment
in_app_payment.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow users to securely make payments through the mobile app with confidence.
in_app_payment.description_disabled: Disable this feature to prevent users from making in-app payments through the mobile application.

ev.title: Email verification
ev.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to complete email verification before they can access the system.
ev.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the system without the need to verify their email addresses.

sv.title: Mobile verification
sv.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to verify their mobile number in order to gain access to the system.
sv.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the system without the need to verify their mobile number.

kv.title: Kyc verification
kv.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to complete KYC verification before they can access the system some features.
kv.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the system some features without the need to verify their KYC Documents.

multi_language.title: Language option
multi_language.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow users to easily switch between different  languages according to their preferences.
multi_language.description_disabled: Disable this feature to remove all language switching options for users within the application.

whatsapp_embedded_signup.title: WhatsApp embedded signup
whatsapp_embedded_signup.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow users for connecting their whatsapp business account vai embedded form.
whatsapp_embedded_signup.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users for connecting their whatsapp business account via embedded form.
